Title: Relates to changing the date for elections for the South New Berlin fire district, Chenango county, to the second Wednesday of December
Summary: Provides that the South New Berlin fire district, Chenango county, shall have elections on the second Wednesday of December.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to providing that the South New Berlin fire district, Chenango county, shall have elections on the second Wednesday of December
